summary:
This Adds a wonderful hunting oriented house just outside of Riverwood.

INCLUDES A COMPANION FOX!!!
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds a hunting oriented cabin outside of riverwood. this cabin includes both crafting tables a workbench, grindstone, tanning rack, anvil, and replenishing sources of food ad iron arrows. also has racks inside and outside for your weapons.

This mod also includes the brave companion fox, Ash> Ash\' will follow you everywhere from the first time he sees you and will attack anything you attack. be warned though. he will not leave! unless you uninstall the mod. if you guys want me to re upload the mod without ash i will.

this mod also changes the environment of the cell the house is located in. it adds a stream and a waterfall as well as adds creatures to the area so it is optimal for hunting.
author: Reeping Havoc
